en.title: Enter contact information
en.line1: Please enter the most appropriate contact details to use for this case.
en.emailAddressHint: This may not be the subject's or applicant's email address. In some cases, it may be the email address of a parent, another relative, or an advocate.
en.contactNumberHint: This may not be the subject's or applicant's contact number. In some cases, it may be the number of a parent, another relative, or an advocate.
en.agreeContactLabel: I agree to be contacted about this case using the details I have provided
